Package gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc

Class LocatorRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.LocatorRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataLocatorRequest, GraphLocatorRequest
    public abstract class LocatorRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a request for the SSC locator_server.

    Notes:

    • The attributes whose description is surrounded by question marks where obtained from examining an example request file from the currently implemented system. Hopefully better descriptions of these attributes will be found.
    Author:
    B. Harris

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean outputCdf
      The location information output file format.
      protected java.lang.String outputFileDir
      The directory where the location information output is to be placed.
      protected int pid
      Requester's process identifier.
      (package private) Request request
      Client version of a request that this class transforms into a request that locator_server understands.
      protected static java.util.SimpleTimeZone UTC_TIME_ZONE
      A UTC TimeZone.

    • Field Detail

      • request

        Request request
        Client version of a request that this class transforms into a request that locator_server understands.

      • pid

        protected int pid
        Requester's process identifier. This value is suppose to be unique and won't be for a long running Java Application Server. Therefore, we can put any value here and rely on it being changed later to a unique value.

      • outputCdf

        private boolean outputCdf
        The location information output file format.

      • outputFileDir

        protected java.lang.String outputFileDir
        The directory where the location information output is to be placed. The value set in this file is over written in the locator_server_ws so that is where the value should be set.

      • UTC_TIME_ZONE

        protected static final java.util.SimpleTimeZone UTC_TIME_ZONE
        A UTC TimeZone.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocatorRequest

        public LocatorRequest​(Request request)
        Creates a LocatorRequest.
        Parameters:
        request - client's version of a request that this class transforms into a request for locator_server

    • Method Detail

      • isOutputCdf

        public boolean isOutputCdf()
        Indicates whether a CDF file is to be output.
        Returns:
        true if a CDF is to be output, otherwise false
        See Also:
        setOutputCdf(boolean), getOutputCdfInt()

      • setOutputCdf

        public void setOutputCdf​(boolean value)
        Sets the outputCdf value.
        Parameters:
        value - new value
        See Also:
        isOutputCdf()

      • getOutputCdfInt

        public int getOutputCdfInt()
        Get the outputCdf value as an integer.
        Returns:
        1 if outputCdf is true, 0 if outputCdf is false

      • setOutputFileDir

        public void setOutputFileDir​(java.lang.String dir)
        Sets the name of the directory where the location information file is to be created.
        Parameters:
        dir - the name of the directory
        See Also:
        getOutputFileDir()

      • getOutputFileDir

        public java.lang.String getOutputFileDir()
        Get the output directory value.
        Returns:
        the output directory
        See Also:
        setOutputFileDir(java.lang.String)

      • createFile

        public abstract java.io.File createFile​(java.lang.String namePrefix)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        SSCExternalException
        Creates a request file for the SSC locator_server in the format that it accepts.
        Parameters:
        namePrefix - the prefix string to be used in generating the file's name; must be at least three characters long
        Returns:
        the file containing the request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the creation of the file
        SSCExternalException - if a invalid option is encountered

      • writeBFieldTraceOptions

        protected static java.lang.String writeBFieldTraceOptions​(java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                                                          BFieldTraceOptions options)
                                                   throws SSCExternalException
        Writes the section of the request specifying a single B field trace option.
        Parameters:
        writer - the PrintWriter to use
        options - B field trace listing options
        Returns:
        the coordinate-system/hemisphere identifier specified by options or null if options is null
        Throws:
        SSCExternalException - if a invalid option is encountered

      • writeValueOptions

        protected static void writeValueOptions​(java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                                        ValueOptions options)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the given ValueOptions to the specified PrintWriter in the format of a locator_server request file.
        Parameters:
        writer - destination where options are to be written
        options - option values to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException occurs

        protected static void writeCoordinateOptions​(java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                                             java.util.List<? extends CoordinateOptions> options)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             SSCExternalException
        Writes the section of the request specifying the coordinate output options.
        Parameters:
        writer - the PrintWriter to use
        options - list of coordinate options to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        SSCExternalException - if a invalid option is encountered

      • getCoordinateOptions

        protected static java.util.HashMap<CoordinateSystem,​CoordinateOptionsContainer> getCoordinateOptions​(java.util.List<? extends CoordinateOptions> options)
                                                                                                    throws SSCExternalException
        Creates a HashMap of coordinate options from the given OutputOptions. The key values for the map are the CoordinateSystem values specified in the given OutputOptions.
        Parameters:
        options - options from which the map is to be created
        Returns:
        map of coordinate options
        Throws:
        SSCExternalException - when outputOptions contains invalid options

      • writeCoordinateSubSection

        protected static void writeCoordinateSubSection​(java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                                                CoordinateSystem coordSystem,
                                                CoordinateOptionsContainer options)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                SSCExternalException
        Writes the section of the request specifying a single coordinate system's output options.
        Parameters:
        writer - the PrintWriter to use
        coordSystem - coodinate system
        options - coordinate system's output options
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        SSCExternalException - if a invalid option is encountered
